summary: All three requested post-login transition requirements appear implemented in the provided diff: redirect is gated until profile fetch completes and is skipped during first-time onboarding (profile null), an in-app interstitial is shown while post-login profile data is still loading, and the /connect redirect uses history replacement.

hallucinated_features.description: Session-scoped “one-time redirect per principal” behavior using sessionStorage (pttstar_redirected_<principal>) to prevent repeated redirects.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specifies redirect timing, interstitial UX, and history replacement; it does not request introducing a sessionStorage-based one-time redirect mechanism keyed by principal.

hallucinated_features.description: Added console logging for redirector state/decisions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of the UX/redirect requirements.
